Our Services

A one-stop shop for Insurance, Real Estate, and More!

Insurance Brokerage Services

Our Insurance Brokerage Services include commercial insurance, general liability, workers compensation, commercial umbrellas, term life insurance, index universal life insurance, whole life insurance, personal lines insurance for auto and homeowners, as well as E&O and professional liability.

Worker's Compensation and General Liability Insurance Services

Opt for streamlined Worker's Comp and General Liability Insurance. It's designed to protect your business efficiently against employee and third-party risks, allowing you to focus on growth with peace of mind.

Restaurant Business Insurance

If you’re a restaurant owner, you need restaurant insurance. We know the risks you face on a daily basis, and we’re here to help with whatever comes your way.

Landscaping Business Insurance Through Every Season

We know how hard you work, and we know the risks you face. Get the landscaping business insurance coverage that understands your needs – and always has your back.

Real Estate Services

Our Real Estate Services offer representation for sellers, buyers, and real estate investors. We also support real estate flippers, buy-and-hold investors, and wholesalers.

LegalShield Memberships

Our LegalShield Memberships cover both commercial and personal memberships, providing assistance with living wills, trust setup, contract reviews, consultations, moving violations representation, and discounted legal defense.

Discover a World of Protection with Fortis Insurance

Dedicated Insurance for Construction Endeavors

Problem: Construction projects are susceptible to a myriad of risks, including accidents on site, delays, and equipment damage or theft.

Solution: Our Construction Insurance provides comprehensive coverage, encompassing general liability, workers' comp, and equipment insurance, ensuring that your projects continue smoothly and on schedule.

Secure Your Craft with Confidence

Problem: Interior carpentry requires precision and can be impacted by accidents or damage to work areas.

Solution: Our BOP and Workers’ Comp policies protect your business from the unexpected, ensuring your craftsmanship continues to shine.

Protect Your Source of Nourishment

Problem: Grocery stores are the community's backbone, yet vulnerable to liabilities like customer injuries or product issues.

Solution: Our policies offer comprehensive protection, from the shelves to the checkout, ensuring your store serves the community without interruption.

Asset Protection for Property Managers

Problem: Managing properties comes with the risk of damage to assets and liability claims.

Solution: Our customized insurance options cover all aspects of property management, from tenant interactions to natural disaster protection.

Robust Coverage for Auto Services

Problem: The auto service industry faces risks from equipment damage to customer vehicle accidents on-site.

Solution: Our insurance plans are designed to cover the specific needs of auto service providers, giving you the security to focus on service excellence.

Essential Protection for Your Culinary Creations

Problem: Restaurants face risks ranging from kitchen fires to food safety concerns, impacting operations and guest experiences.

Solution: Our specialized Restaurant Insurance goes beyond general liability, offering coverage for property, employee, and guest-related incidents, ensuring you can continue delighting palates without worry.

Comprehensive Coverage for Landscaping Services

Problem: Landscapers encounter risks such as equipment theft, accidental property damage, and weather interruptions.

Solution: Our Landscaping Insurance policies protect against a wide array of industry-specific risks, ensuring that your business grows as beautifully as the lawns you maintain.

Powering Your Success Through Our Strategic Partnerships

We collaborate with a hand-picked network of industry-leading partners, offering you the highest quality services and solutions under one roof. Your needs and goals are our priority, and to ensure your success, we leverage these partnerships to bring you the best of what the industry has to offer.

Meet Pedro Alejandro Fortiz - Your Personal Guide to Navigating the Real Estate & Insurance Landscape.

Pedro Fortiz, a Maryland insider, turns the complex world of real estate and insurance into a straightforward journey. With his in-depth understanding and expertise, he transforms each step into an experience that's not just extraordinary, but personalized to your unique needs.

Certified and Trusted:

Pedro, a registered NAR Realtor and a member of GCAAR, is devoted to going above and beyond, ensuring your real estate and insurance endeavors meet success.

Service Beyond Expectations:

Pedro envisions delivering the highest level of customer service that doesn't merely fulfill your requirements but turns your real estate or insurance journey into a triumphant narrative.

FAQ: Unlocking Business Security

Dive into our FAQs to understand how our bespoke business insurance policies fortify your venture's future. Ready for more detail? Our experts are just a call away!

What Comprehensive Coverage Does Business Insurance Offer?

Beyond the basics, our business insurance offers a safety net for your assets, covering property damage, legal liabilities, employee-related risks, and much more. Let's discuss a plan that secures all corners of your business!

How Do I Tailor Business Income for Insurance to My Company's Needs?

Calculating business income for insurance isn't just about the numbers; it's about understanding your operation's heartbeat. Connect with us to navigate through net income, operating expenses, and beyond, ensuring your coverage matches your business's pulse.

Why is Business Insurance the Backbone of My Venture?

Business insurance doesn't just protect; it propels. Shielding from unforeseen events and aligning with legal requirements, it's the silent guardian ready to turn potential pitfalls into pathways for growth. Let's ensure your business is fortified.

Unlocking the Mysteries of Business Insurance – Why is it My Business's Lifeline?

It's more than a safety net; it's a strategic asset. Business insurance is vital for safeguarding your dream against the unpredictable, ensuring that your journey from startup to industry leader is secure and supported at every step. Discover how with our team.
